article:
It was a Saturday. Mom 36 _  Betty to tidy her bedroom, where toys and clothes were   _  everywhere on the floor. Mom said to Betty, "You know things get broken or lost easily  _   they're not in good order." "OK" Betty said.
   When Mum came back a few minutes   _   , all the toys and clothes had disappeared.
   Mum was  _   , and asked Betty to get some pocket money out of her   _    in the tidy drawer. Betty went over,    _   it out and carried it over to the table. Betty found a bottle of red ink just like blood;  _  , there were some vampire   teeth, too. Betty felt very   _  , and asked her mom to dress her up as a vampire.
   They  _  for a whole morning and then Mom said, "But we still haven't found my purse."
"Well, you should put things in good  _  next time,"  Betty said seriously. "You are a clever monkey!" Mom  _   and then asked "But what should I do, dear?"
"Do it like this. It's easy," Betty said, got  _  off the table into her arms, and then  _  them all back into the drawer. Mom looked at Betty  _  and said, "Are you sure you have put your things in order? Let's have a   _   again."
Betty followed   _   into the room. Then they heard the cat's sound. Mom bent down and   _  the bedcover to see if it was there.   _   the bed were Betty's toys, clothes and many other things.
               "Betty! How would you   _  this?
Betty's face became red and could say nothing.
